messages.body: Hello! Could you please help me remove my Visa card from your platform? I'm trying to do it myself but the system keeps asking me to cancel subscriptions first, and I'm not sure how to do that. Would it be possible for you to handle this directly? It would be much easier for me. Thank you for your help!

Hey there,

Since you've made a recent purchase, here are a few links that may help solve things right away:

If you're looking for a refund or have a product-specific question, you can contact the creator directly by replying to your emailed receipt. If you never got a receipt, please check your spam folder, or send it again by filling out the form here.

Need an invoice? I need an Invoice

Need to cancel a membership/subscription? How to Cancel a Membership

Want to transfer a purchase to a different email address or account? Just let us know both the current and desired email addresses.

Many other questions may be answered in our Customer Help Center

If you still need help, no worries! Just reply to this email and let us know, and we'll get to your request ASAP. Thanks!
